posts.title: cloud computing -- hw1
posts.text: What are the technical components of the operational capability technology? Broadband network and Internet architecture: Internet is based on a centerless supply and management model and is not controlled by any centralized entity.The main components are connectionless packet switching and router-based interconnection using network routers and interactive machines. Data center technology: the data center is a special IT infrastructure for centralized storage of IT resources, which should be operable remotely and have high availability. Virtualization technology: server virtualization refers to the use of virtualization software to abstract IT hardware into virtual servers, which is hardware-independent and has multiple levels of virtualization technology. Web technology: the common term for the implementation of cloud services, the basic technologies include URL, HTTP, HTML and XML, with great flexibility. Multi-tenant technology: similar to virtualizing software, each tenant is unaware of the existence of other tenants, which can improve security and facilitate billing. Service technology: it is composed of Web services, service agents and service middleware, which standardizes and simplifies the deployment of cloud services. List at least three virtualization softwar. Docker: container virtualization, virtualizing a separate environment on the host computer for software use, rather than virtualizing a new system, is more convenient to use, but the simulation is not as real as the virtual machine. The bare metal virtualization system provided by VMware ESXi:VMware does not need a host system and can run multiple virtual machines directly. The personal virtualization software provided by VMware Workstation:VMware needs to run the software on the host operating system and then run the virtual machine on the software.
